experimentGenerator module¶

experimentGenerator Module¶

Author:Dominic Hunt

Classes¶

Task() The abstract experiment class from which all others inherit
TaskGeneration(experiment_name[, parameters, …]) Generates experiment class instances based on an experiment and a set of varying parameters

Class Inheritance Diagram¶

Author:Dominic Hunt
class experimentGenerator.TaskGeneration(experiment_name, parameters=None, other_options=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Generates experiment class instances based on an experiment and a set of varying parameters

Parameters:
  • experiment_name (string) – The name of the file where a experiment.experimentTemplate.Task class can be found
  • parameters (dictionary of floats or lists of floats) – Parameters are the options that you are or are likely to change across experiment instances. When a parameter contains a list, an instance of the experiment will be created for every combination of this parameter with all the others. Default None
  • other_options (dictionary of float, string or binary valued elements) – These contain all the the experiment options that describe the experiment being studied but do not vary across experiment instances. Default None
iter_experiment_ID()[source]¶

Yields the experiment IDs. To be used with self.new_experiment(expID) to receive the next experiment instance

Returns:expID – The ID number that refers to the next experiment parameter combination.
Return type:int
new_experiment(experiment_number)[source]¶

Produces the next experiment instance

Parameters:experiment_number (int) – The number of the experiment instance to be initialised
Returns:instance
Return type:experiment.experiment.experiment instance
next()[source]¶

Produces the next experiment instance for the iterator

Returns:instance
Return type:experiment.experimentTemplate.experiment instance
